channel.title: The engineer update
channel.description:
Along with [url='https://www.teamfortress.com/post.php?id=3788&p=1']today's blog post[/url] which added the new badge, there seems to have been a new [url='https://www.teamfortress.com/119/comingsoon.html']engy update teaser trailer[/url].
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-7BUGi570Zs']Here[/url] is a breakdown of the trailer if you are too lazy to look for the clues yourself.
If anyone remembers, the old hidden pages of updates long ago seem to hint towards a few things found in the trailer. Some conspiracy theorists say that it is not coincidence that since the "100" newspaper appeared on the menu it will have been 100 days on May 7th, Ironman 2's release.
Will update as more info comes.

item.title: The engineer update
item.dc:creator: mechaelite
item.description:
Mr.Shadow:

Vealv lieks to rceylce suonds.

I louv how ya write mate (no kidding)

also valve is famous in tf2 for puttin easter eggs in their vids. Like the meet the spy 1, the sniper was wearing a hat unlockable so… maybe there’s something (not only the blueprint) wich can tell us what is he working at, I want a flamethrower sentry!!

Read full topic

Vealv lieks to rceylce suonds.

item.title: The engineer update
item.dc:creator: Acristoff
item.description:
If you read the L4D blog you can see that VALVe likes making teasers like they did for the passing (and the new engy update teaser), also I could have sworn that I’ve seen that exact same torch in the steam forums that a couple of guys were making…

lets wait to see it just like we do until black mesa its released :3

item.description:

item.description:
Along with today’s blog post which added the new badge, there seems to have been a new engy update teaser trailer.

Here is a breakdown of the trailer if you are too lazy to look for the clues yourself.

If anyone remembers, the old hidden pages of updates long ago seem to hint towards a few things found in the trailer. Some conspiracy theorists say that it is not coincidence that since the “100” newspaper appeared on the menu it will have been 100 days on May 7th, Ironman 2’s release.
